languages.text: Whenever wielder hits an enemy with a shield, all allies in 3sq range gain +5 Resolve

traits.locale_text: Whenever wielder hits an enemy with a shield, all allies in 3sq range gain +5 Resolve

languages.text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a shield, all allies in a 3-cell radius gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж совершает попадание по врагу щитом, каждый союзник в радиусе 3 клеток получает +5 к решимости.

traits.locale_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a shield, all allies in a 3-cell radius gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.
When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a shield, all allies in a 3-cell radius gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.
When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a shield, all allies in a 3-cell radius gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.
When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a shield, all allies in a 3-cell radius gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

languages.text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по врагу щитом, каждый союзник в радиусе 3 клеток получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} до конца боя. Не суммируется.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a shield, all allies in a 3-cell radius gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по врагу щитом, каждый союзник в радиусе 3 клеток получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} до конца боя. Не суммируется.

Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по врагу щитом, каждый союзник в радиусе 3 клеток получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} до конца боя. Не суммируется.

languages.text: 使用者がシールドで敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、戦闘終了まで半径3セル以内のすべての味方の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+5される。この効果はスタックしない。
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a shield, all allies in a 3-cell radius gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がシールドで敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、戦闘終了まで半径3セル以内のすべての味方の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+5される。この効果はスタックしない。
使用者がシールドで敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}するたびに、半径3セル以内のすべての味方の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+5される。

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen Gegner mit einem Schild {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} erhalten alle Verbündeten in einem Radius von 3 Feldern bis zum Ende des Kampfes +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}. Nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a shield, all allies in a 3-cell radius gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger einen Gegner mit einem Schild {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} erhalten alle Verbündeten in einem Radius von 3 Feldern bis zum Ende des Kampfes +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}. Nicht stapelbar.
Wenn der Träger einen Feind mit einem Schild {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} erhalten alle Verbündeten im Umkreis von 3 Feldern +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.
Wenn der Träger einen Feind mit einem Schild {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} erhalten alle Verbündeten im Umkreis von 3 Feldern +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.

languages.text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo usando un escudo, todos los aliados en un radio de 3 casillas ganan +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a shield, all allies in a 3-cell radius gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo usando un escudo, todos los aliados en un radio de 3 casillas ganan +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo usando un escudo, todos los aliados en un radio de 3 casillas ganan +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用盾牌{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，距离3格内的所有盟友都会获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。此效果不可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a shield, all allies in a 3-cell radius gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用盾牌{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，距离3格内的所有盟友都会获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。此效果不可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
每当装备者使用盾牌{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，距离3格内的所有盟友都会获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。

languages.text: Takan kişi, bir düşmana kalkan ile {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} 3 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki tüm dost birimler +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} kazanır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a shield, all allies in a 3-cell radius gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Takan kişi, bir düşmana kalkan ile {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} 3 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki tüm dost birimler +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} kazanır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
Takan kişi, bir düşmana kalkan ile {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} 3 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki tüm dost birimler +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} kazanır.

languages.text: Quand le porteur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi utilisant un bouclier, tous les alliés dans un rayon de 3 cases reçoivent un bonus de +5 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Non cumulable.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a shield, all allies in a 3-cell radius gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Quand le porteur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi utilisant un bouclier, tous les alliés dans un rayon de 3 cases reçoivent un bonus de +5 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Non cumulable.

Chaque fois que le porteur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi utilisant un bouclier, tous les alliés dans un rayon de 3 cases reçoivent un bonus de +5 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.

Chaque fois que le porteur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi utilisant un bouclier, tous les alliés dans un rayon de 3 cases reçoivent un bonus de +5 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.
